pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Kernel Unsupervised Methods // Robust kernel center matrix, robust kernel cross-covariance operator for kernel unsupervised methods, kernel canonical correlation analysis, influence function of identifying significant outliers or atypical objects from multimodal datasets. Alam, M. A, Fukumizu, K., Wang Y.-P. (2018) doi:10.1016/j.neucom.2018.04.008. Alam, M. A, Calhoun, C. D., Wang Y.-P. (2018) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2018.03.013.
